commentBody: Hillary has the whole of the DNC establishment basically pandering to her and trying to thwart Bernie's campaign in any way possible, especially Debbie Wasserman Schultz and you're complaining about a handful of "Bernie Bros" who are a bit passionate about their candidate (something Hillary can't claim). You're causing a ruckus about nothing. Get a grip on reality. Why don't you write about how the media and the DNC are ignoring anything that Bernie does.
